description: Marcus Mojo has got himself a problem. Damn Shake Weight. It seems that he was working out with this little gadget and managed to really fuck his shoulders up. Luckily for him, the gym has recently added an in house masseuse, Dominic Pacifico. Dominic is great at what he does, and before too long, he's got all the kinks worked out of Marcus' system. Of course, in the meantime, he has also managed to work up quite a healthy boner. But no matter, one good turn deserves another, so Marcus immediately helps himself. In no time, both of them are feeling much better!Enjoy!
title: Loosen Me Up
